translated: Aristophanes (Ἀριστοφάνης / Aristophanes) is a playwright (playwright) Athenian of antiquity, was born in Attica to -450, -385 to death.
original: Aristophane (Ἀριστοφάνης / Aristophánês) est un auteur de théâtre (un dramaturge) athénien de l'Antiquité, né en Attique vers -450, mort vers -385.
